name: Fruit Loko Lite
description:
Vax the spikefish loves Fruit. Has he gone loko? Follow the Fruit through this addictive puzzle game. But beware, the other spikefish will stop Vax at all costs!


Touch the screen and your fish will follow through the depths of this addictive puzzle game. Collect fruit and avoid the spike-fish!


FEATURES:

> High Resolution Retina Display Graphics!
> Addictive and ORIGINAL gameplay!
> Game Center Support!
> Addictive Replayability!
> The Simplest Game on the App Store!
> Strategy and Puzzle!
